DataElement.preferredName: Aqueous Cream Skin Care Product Administered Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator for information related to the administration of a aqueous cream skin care product.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Aqueous Cream Dosage Form Skin Care Product Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Having to do with water._A semi-solid composed of an emulsion of lipids, hydrocarbons, waxes, or polyols in water._Any skin care product containing humectants, emollients and emulsifiers with moisturizing activity. These products increase the skin's hydration and are used to soften and protect dry skin._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Having to do with water.:A semi-solid composed of an emulsion of lipids, hydrocarbons, waxes, or polyols in water.

Concepts.definition: A semi-solid composed of an emulsion of lipids, hydrocarbons, waxes, or polyols in water.

Property.preferredDefinition: Any skin care product containing humectants, emollients and emulsifiers with moisturizing activity. These products increase the skin's hydration and are used to soften and protect dry skin.:The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Concepts.definition: Any skin care product containing humectants, emollients and emulsifiers with moisturizing activity. These products increase the skin's hydration and are used to soften and protect dry skin.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 1/17/2020: CM Released as part of draft content review

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk
